title: **Skills**
subtitle: Technologies I *work with*
description: Here's a look at my skill set. The **tech world** changes every moment and that's what makes it *exciting*! I constantly keep my knowledge up to date and love exploring **new technologies** to keep growing.

descriptions.graphicDesignDescription: Design pieces for social media (banners, flyers, posts, stories)
descriptions.brandingDescription: Basic brand identity design (simple logos, color palettes, typography)
descriptions.imageEditingDescription: Basic image editing (color correction, cropping, simple montage)
descriptions.webPerformanceDescription: Basic page performance and optimization (images, lazy loading, etc.)
descriptions.webAccessibilityDescription: Basic web accessibility (good contrast, semantic structure, labels, etc.)
descriptions.styleGuidesDescription: Basic brand style guides (logo usage, colors, typography)
descriptions.integrationsDescription: Integration of external tools (forms, chats, simple CRMs, newsletters)
descriptions.automationDescription: Automations with Make / Zapier (e.g.: form → email → spreadsheet)
descriptions.apisWebhooksDescription: Integration between web and third-party tools (Notion, Sheets, etc.)
